message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and unparalleled performance, it's truly a game-changer in its field. I believe in its value and potential impact on your business, hence I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you. My initial offer for this exceptional product is $15000. I understand that value perception varies, so if this aligns with your expectations, I'd be delighted to proceed with the transaction.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $12000 for the product. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this range?
